channel.title: I can not enter recovery mode.
channel.description:
Hello world
Host: Debian GNU / Linux 10 (buster) Virtualbox: 6.0.14 r133895 (Qt5.11.3) Whonix: I download Whonix-XFCE-current.ova
The problem is as follows. If I only import the car, then I go into recovery mode without problems.
But after executing the command: sudo apt-get-update-plus dist-upgrade && sudo apt-get clean
When entering the recovery mode, the terminal stops at this stage. I can’t attach the image, rewrite a few lines:
[ 5.602219] audit: type=1400 audit (1574673711.120:18): apparmor="STATUS" operation="profile_load" profile="unconfined" name="/usr/bin/whonixchek" pid=410 comm="apparmor_parser" ... [ 5. ******] snd_intel8x0 0000:00:05.0: measure - unreliable DMA position.. [ 6. ******] snd_intel8x0 0000:00:05.0: measure - unreliable DMA position.. [ 6. ******] snd_intel8x0 0000:00:05.0: clocking to 48000
If you just enter "changeme", then nothing happens. I can’t understand what the problem is.

item.title: I can not enter recovery mode.
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Don’t forget to press Enter.

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Recovery#Recovery_Mode

Read full topic
item.source: I can not enter recovery mode.

item.title: I can not enter recovery mode.
item.dc:creator: Pfm8yocd2q4tjHbHH9Ae
item.description:
Hello world

Host: Debian GNU / Linux 10 (buster)
Virtualbox: 6.0.14 r133895 (Qt5.11.3)
Whonix: I download Whonix-XFCE-current.ova

The problem is as follows. If I only import the car, then I go into recovery mode without problems.

But after executing the command:
sudo apt-get-update-plus dist-upgrade && sudo apt-get clean

When entering the recovery mode, the terminal stops at this stage. I can’t attach the image, rewrite a few lines:

[    5.602219] audit: type=1400 audit (1574673711.120:18): apparmor="STATUS" operation="profile_load" profile="unconfined" name="/usr/bin/whonixchek" pid=410 comm="apparmor_parser"
...
[    5. ******] snd_intel8x0 0000:00:05.0: measure - unreliable DMA position..
[    6. ******] snd_intel8x0 0000:00:05.0: measure - unreliable DMA position..
[    6. ******] snd_intel8x0 0000:00:05.0: clocking to 48000

If you just enter “changeme”, then nothing happens. I can’t understand what the problem is.

Read full topic
item.source: I can not enter recovery mode.
